title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Correct Answer: Speed v is greater.

Note: Response must address the change in potential difference or an effect (or non-effect) of the change in potential difference to receive any credit.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes one of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes two of the following criteria.
The response accurately includes all of the following criteria.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:

Note: A student that assumes the particle makes it to the hole with the same speed and then curves in a counterclockwise path earns one point.
